text: adinre saheadaranre vivaram ariyiccukeatukkuka. ahkhaphile tanre janatakk addeham munnariyipp nalkiya karyam. munnariyippukar addehattinu mumpum pimpum kalinnupeayittunt. a munnariyippita: allahuvinallate marrarkkum ninnal valippett jivikkarut. ninnalute mel bhikaranalile siksa vannettumenn nan bhayappetunnu
